sentiment_articles.title: Meta and Microsoft beat earnings. Wall Street's eyes are now on Apple and Amazon.
sentiment_articles.summary: Shares of Meta and Microsoft soared in premarket trading after the companies reported earnings. Will Apple and Amazon do the same?

sentiment_articles.title: Microsoft stock surges 9% as Azure earnings smash expectations and the AI boom rolls on
sentiment_articles.summary: Microsoft (MSFT) stock rose sharply Thursday morning, a day after the tech giant blew past Wall Street’s expectations in its fiscal third-quarter earnings report.Read more...

sentiment_articles.title: What Are You Panic-Buying Before Tariff Price Hikes?
sentiment_articles.summary: With Trump's tariffs jacking up prices for virtually everything, you probably should stock up on your favorite goods now while prices are still affordable.
